attributes.action: consider placing online, all acts of parliament prior to 1988
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, only acts of parliament from 1988 are accessible online.  I would like to see all acts of parliament throughout history scanned and placed online in a format for anybody to read at home.  This would be an invaluable tool for historians and scholars and for students researching the history of our nation.
